title: ICoEdge.GetCurve
description: Gets the underlying curve of this coedge if the coedge is a result of imprecisely sewing two surfaces together.
returns: Curve that is attached to this coedge (see Remarks )
remarks:
This method may return Nothing if no geometry is attached to the coedge. The edge may still be accurate, and you can obtain the geometry from the edge using:
ICoEdge::GetEdge
IEdge::GetCurve
